title: Leavebuster (20 mins)
body: Hello, I don't know why I got a Leavebuster. For the  past few games, I have been crashing a lot and I have to hard shutdown my PC over and over again. (Crashing happens in the loading screen after the Champion Select.) I do reconnect to the game, though, I don't understand. Thanks.

replies.body: Are you getting any errors after champion select, and what does it say?  The best way to recover from leaverbuster is to play without leaving, so it's important to get that resolved.  Let me know!
Well, you know on the bottom right corner, the blue spinning thing? It's spinning..then it suddenly stops. How can I resolve this? Other than that, League is working fine.
I'm not sure which one spinning thing unfortunately.  Would you be able to offer a screenshot and any further details of your issue- through a custom game?
Never mind, League isn't crashing anymore! Thanks for your help!
